name: disabled attribute of the fieldset element
description: Allows disabling all of the form control descendants of a fieldset via a `disabled` attribute on the fieldset element itself.

byNum.1: Text inputs that are descendants of a disabled fieldset appear disabled but the user can still interact with them. [See IE bug #962368.](https://web.archive.org/web/20170306075528/https://connect.microsoft.com/IE/feedbackdetail/view/962368/can-still-edit-input-type-text-within-fieldset-disabled)
byNum.2: File inputs that are descendants of a disabled fieldset appear disabled but the user can still interact with them. [See IE bug #817488.](https://web.archive.org/web/20170306075531/https://connect.microsoft.com/IE/feedbackdetail/view/817488)
